name: Avoid undocumented Methods
description:
Methods should be documented. This reports shows all methods with no comments.
Methods include constructors, destructors, and ABAP Event Method.
For C#, it excludes getters and setters if the properties/indexer they belong to is documented
output:
This report lists all methods that are not documented.
It provides the following information:
Method, Event Method, Constructor, Destrcutor full name
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code. This rule will ensure there are comments within the Artifact.
remediation: Add comments into method implementation to explain what is their goal and how they work.
total: Number of Methods, Event Methods, Constructors and Destructors
